comments.author: Steve Love
comments.message: Yeah, sorry about my banging away on the keys. I had no idea there was any audio capture going on.

comments.author: Zach Leatherman
comments.message: It's all good! Is that a DAS Keyboard you're rocking?

comments.author: Steve Love
comments.message: Nah, just a cheap USB keyboard. Hadn't heard of Das Keyboard before, but now I'm going to have to buff the letters off my keys and pretend like it's the Ultimate model.
